data.title: Interview with Gabriel Robin (Paris, 10 June 2009) — Excerpt: the election of Georges Pompidou as French President
meta_keywords: 10 june 2009) — excerpt: the election of georges pompidou as french president
data.meta_description: In this interview excerpt, Gabriel Robin, diplomat at the French Permanent Representation to the European Communities from 1967 to 1969 and adviser in the Prime Minister’s Office in 1969, describes the turning point in France’s European policy marked by Georges Pompidou’s election as President of the French Republic in 1969.
